hooks.command: if ! command -v gh &> /dev/null; then curl -fsSL https://cli.github.com/packages/githubcli-archive-keyring.gpg | sudo dd of=/usr/share/keyrings/githubcli-archive-keyring.gpg 2>/dev/null && echo 'deb [arch=$(dpkg --print-architecture) signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/githubcli-archive-keyring.gpg] https://cli.github.com/packages stable main' | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/github-cli.list > /dev/null && sudo apt-get update -qq && sudo apt-get install gh -y -qq; fi
